instructors.name: מר ערן שחם
instructors.description: מנהל בית הספר להייטק וסייבר באוניברסיטת בר-אילן, בעל ניסיון של למעלה מ-30 שנים כמרצה ומנהל הדרכות בתחום הסייבר ואבטחת המידע. יזם, הקים וניהל קורסי תעודה במחשבים בטכניון, ניהל את 'מלם-תים הדרכה', ומנהל מרכזי הדרכה מורשים של חברות מובילות בתחום הווירטואליזציה, תקשורת ואבטחת מידע.

instructors.name: מר רוני אפלבוים

instructors.description: מומחית לעיצוב חווית משתמש (UI/UX), מעצבת ממשקים, אתרים ואפליקציות, מומחית למיתוג וסטארטאפיסטית.

instructors.name: מר נעם שחם
instructors.description: מומחה לשיווק סטרטאפים, בעל 10 שנות ניסיון כמנהל קמפיינים בשווקים בינלאומיים ובשוק המקומי, אנליסט לשיפור ביצועים ומכירות באתרים ואפליקציות, מומחה GA עם ניסיון על GA4.

instructors.name: מר יובל כץ

instructors.name: גב' מיטל לויטה

summary: The Certified Digital Marketing Professional course offered by Bar-Ilan University's School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security is a comprehensive program designed to train skilled digital marketing professionals. The program focuses on digital marketing for startups, AI tools, and digital entrepreneurship. It prepares students to use advanced technological tools, create marketing strategies, and implement campaigns across various platforms such as Google Ads, social media, and e-commerce. The course includes practical training, theoretical knowledge, and real-world case studies. Graduates will be eligible to take the international Google Ads certification exam and receive four prestigious certificates from Bar-Ilan University. The program is led by experienced instructors and industry experts, offering personal guidance and access to a professional alumni community. The curriculum covers topics such as content marketing, SEO, PPC, social media advertising, B2B marketing, and digital entrepreneurship. Students will also complete a final project involving website creation, SEO optimization, and campaign management. The course spans six months, with classes held twice a week, and includes 200 hours of frontal instruction. It is open to marketing professionals, business owners, and individuals seeking career changes or additional income opportunities.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: Certified Digital Marketing Professional (שיווק דיגיטלי) - המסלול השלם להכשרת אנשי שיווק דיגיטלי עם התמחות בשיווק סטרטאפים, כלי AI ויזמות דיגיטלית.

COURSE OVERVIEW: This program is designed to prepare students to become skilled digital marketing professionals. It provides in-depth knowledge and practical skills in digital marketing, including startup marketing, AI tools, and digital entrepreneurship. The program emphasizes the importance of digital marketing in the hi-tech world and equips participants with the ability to market businesses locally and globally. Graduates will be prepared to take the international Google Ads certification exam and embark on a new, exciting career in digital marketing.

TARGET AUDIENCE: 
- Marketing professionals and business owners seeking to specialize in digital marketing.
- Individuals looking for career changes, additional career opportunities, or increased income.
- Business owners aiming to promote their businesses.
- Recently discharged soldiers interested in exploring and working in the field.

COURSE LEADERSHIP: 
- Program Manager: Mr. Eran Shaham, Director of the School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security at Bar-Ilan University, with over 30 years of experience in cyber and information security training.
- Professional Advisors: Dr. Moshe Yonatani, a digital marketing researcher and lecturer, and Mr. Yair Koren, a digital marketing agency manager and experienced lecturer.
- Additional Lecturers: Mr. Roni Applebaum (marketing writing and copywriting), Ms. Yael Ben Mayor (UX/UI design), Mr. Liran Weiss (e-commerce platforms), Mr. Noam Shaham (startup marketing), Mr. Yuval Katz (digital entrepreneurship), Ms. Meital Levita (social media marketing), and Ms. Eliana Adler (PPC campaigns).

PREREQUISITES: 
- Admission interview with the program's academic director.
- Preferable experience in marketing, sales, or entrepreneurship.
- Basic knowledge of English.

CERTIFICATIONS: "מומחה לשיווק דיגיטלי", "מומחה לשיווק ברשתות חברתיות", "מומחה ניהול קמפיינים ממומנים PPC", "מומחה לקידום אתרים אורגני".

COURSE SCHEDULE: 
- Start Date: 12.12.2024.
- Duration: Approximately six months.
- Schedule: Mondays and Thursdays, 17:30 – 21:30.
- Total Hours: 200 frontal academic hours.
- Additional makeup classes may be scheduled on non-regular days.

LEARNING FORMAT: 
- Location: School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security, Bar-Ilan University Campus, Ramat Gan, and online.
- All classes are recorded and available to students during and after the course.
- Advanced multimedia systems in classrooms for interactive learning.
- Some classes may be conducted via Zoom, subject to university and Home Front Command guidelines.

TUITION AND FEES: 
- Registration Fee: 480 ₪.
- Tuition Fee: 12,500 ₪.
- International certification exam fee is external and separate.

COURSE TOPICS: 
- **Part A: Introduction to Digital Marketing and Strategic Marketing Plan (5 hours)**
  - Understanding digital marketing concepts.
  - Developing a marketing plan for a business or company.
  - Competitor research and audience analysis.
  - Setting goals and objectives using digital tools.
  - Conducting market research with AI tools.

- **Part B: Marketing Writing (20 hours)**
  - Identifying customer needs.
  - Creating content that drives action.
  - Using AI tools for creating engaging marketing content.

- **Part C: Building WordPress and Wix Websites (15 hours)**
  - Website specification and design.
  - Introduction to WordPress and Wix.
  - Differences between open-source and closed-source platforms.
  - Building landing pages, business websites, and e-commerce sites.

- **Part D: Organic Search Engine Marketing (30 hours)**
  - Understanding Google algorithms.
  - Keyword research and SEO techniques.
  - Google My Business and Google Search Console.
  - YouTube promotion and ASO (App Store Optimization).

- **Part E: Paid Search Engine Marketing (35 hours)**
  - Google Ads campaign creation and optimization.
  - AI integration in campaigns.
  - Preparation for Google Ads certification exams.

- **Part F: Social Media Marketing (30 hours)**
  - Organic and paid advertising on platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok.
  - Advanced campaign strategies and AI integration.

- **Part G: Pixels and Conversions Workshop (5 hours)**
  - Understanding and implementing tracking pixels.
  - Using Google Tag Manager for advanced tracking.

- **Part H: B2B Marketing and Employer Branding (10 hours)**
  - LinkedIn marketing strategies.
  - Digital marketing for employee recruitment.

- **Part I: Content Marketing and Distribution Tools (10 hours)**
  - Campaigns on Taboola and Outbrain.
  - UX/UI workshops.

- **Part J: Optimization and Marketing Automation (20 hours)**
  - Tools for digital marketing optimization.
  - Google Analytics and heatmaps.
  - Marketing automation basics.

- **Part K: Digital Entrepreneurship and E-Commerce Platforms (20 hours)**
  - Building and managing digital assets.
  - Guest lectures by successful digital entrepreneurs.

- **Final Project:**
  - Building and promoting a WordPress website.
  - Creating and optimizing campaigns on Google Ads, Taboola, Outbrain, LinkedIn, and social media.
  - Developing a comprehensive marketing plan with AI tools.

- Registration fees are non-refundable unless the program is canceled by the university.
